string-array.name: Undoecodes
string-array.item: No More Moves Left!!
Can\'t Undo Anymore!!
Don\'t get too Toyed with the button!!
It is not a Toy Bastard!!
Try Playing the game Once for a while!!

string-array.name: PlayerNameErrorCodes
string-array.item: Mr. Blank Enter your name please!!
Enter your Name Bastard!!
Sorry Can\'t Leave Empty!!
Are you out of your gourd??
Work on it Man!! Keep a Name for yourself!!

string-array.name: TimeUpHandsOff
string-array.item: Yo Take ur hands off me Time is Up!!
Time is Up!! please untouch the screen to continue!
Don\'t get too attached with the screen!!
Don\'t worry just 1 point gone you can win it Hands OFF!!

string-array.name: Tips
string-array.item: Try Playing with Timer(Only for Professionals)
Remember you can\'t undo AI\'s Move!!
Playing Silent control volume in Options Menu
Like Dark mode!! Checkout the theme option
The Timer runs for 10 seconds!! Make a move before it runs out!!
Not interested in setting the game every time?? Try the Default Game Settings
Like Personal icons see our Icon Collection
Play with our AI!! It has brains (Based on what you wish for!!)
Have a lot of friends!!Try our Multiplayer mode!!
